org.easybatch.extensions.mongodb

Class MongoDBRecordMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.extensions.mongodb.MongoDBRecordMapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The target object type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordMapper<MongoDBRecord,GenericRecord<T>>, RecordProcessor<MongoDBRecord,GenericRecord<T>>

    public class MongoDBRecordMapper<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordMapper<MongoDBRecord,GenericRecord<T>>
    A mapper that maps Mongo DBObject to domain objects using Morphia.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
